title: Looking for Love
text: I'm down to earth, laid back, intelligent, straightforward, attractive, honest, respectful, and considerate. If I sound interesting, don't be shy and send me a note and we'll see what happens. Thanks for reading! 40-50 only!! no picture no respone. thanks.

title: please dont judge....just wanna be treated right
text:

I like to cook and bake...movies...dinners out...bonfires. 
Would like to find someone who is kind...understanding and sweet. Perhaps you have been in a similar situation or are in one. Please don't judge. Just want to be happy...we all deserve happiness.

title: Looking for
text:
I am a 28 year old female with an attractive thin but curvy body. Caucasian and brunette. I'm very busy, but fun when I'm available.

My long term goal is a house in the woods with chickens. 

I am super open minded but picky, so be better than everyone else. I will not host.

I have two children and do not want more. Their father is pleasant and active and has them half of the time. I am a non-smoker. I work too much. 

I am seeking male age 27 to 37. Older than this and there seems to be a disconnect in our conversations. Plus, I have young parents and things get weird. I like men who can build things and fix things. I also enjoy men in fields of science and healthcare. I prefer those established in their careers rather than students, just because of our ages. I say "men" but I am open to women too because I like both. I only like feminine women. 

As I said, I am busy, so don't expect to meet up soon. But do start a conversation with me. Since I get so many replies, a simple hello with no explanation of who you are will get deleted. I prefer pictures and will usually share my own in return. Thanks!

title: I wanna dance with someone who loves me-serious ltr 38
text:
I am a single mom who is looking for someone special. Someone who wants to know me in and out and support my dreams, as I will his. Someone who will be my soft place to land. Someone who is warm, understanding but strong at the same time. Someone who wants to be with me and wants to hold me. I want to make love and all of that is so much more powerful if it is with someone you love and who loves you. Looking for someone mature (not old) just not selfish and shallow.

Ok I am a bbw, brown hair, big brown eyes and short. I am a non-smoker (please be as well) and I don't drink. If you are a light drinker that's fine with me but NO drugs!! That's a deal breaker. I am looking for someone from about 34-47. I would love to have one more. I would love to give my son a sibling.

I like to go to the movies, talking on the phone, playing board games, swimming and going out to eat. I am warm, kind and understanding and very supportive. 
Please reply with some info about yourself, such as age, location, a general description of yourself and I have pics to share upon request. PLEASE do NOT respond if you have a problem with my ad or don't like bbw's or have something insulting to say!! I am too busy with a very small child and everything else I have to do to waste my time. Sorry if that sounds rude but that's just the way it is. 
Also please be a person who actually wants to meet, talk on the phone or do something. Again this may sound rude (sorry) but I am sick of guys who just want to text for days upon end and have no idea how to talk or to treat a lady. Please respond with a general description, your age and location (I don't want to get my hopes up for someone in California). A Pic would be great and anything else you would like to share. My schedule has opened up a bit in the mornings and sometimes evenings. Thank you very much. Hope to hear from some wonderful men soon.

title: The Universe
text: How is it the universe can be so messed up and mean that it tries to destroy perfectly good people while obvious bad people get away with it all? I mean seriously, my faith no longer exists, which is so sad because anyone who meets me instantly likes me because I genuinely am a good person. Sometimes I ask myself what's the point?

title: When you know. ..
text: ....you know. You can be with someone forever and never know. Maybe you loved them at a point but the hurt was too great to bear and you walked away. You rebuilt became happy, became stronger. You maybe open up to possibilities but just see how incredibly hurtful people are to each other. People throw around terms like "soul mate" and "love of my life" to the point where it loses all meaning. I mean honestly, how many "loves of your life" do you get? I am starting to rethink this whole "love" thing. Which is sad honestly, because I used to be a huge fan.

title: Intelligence and humor
text: Are you interested in dating an intelligent, pretty, witty, wild big woman? I want to spend time with a loving, interesting man who has a sense of humor and a love of life. title: My other half.
text:
Hi, are you searching for your other half? I've come to the point in life where I am ready to share my life again. 
Me: I'm 38 years old. I live alone. I have my own vehicle. I hold a bachelor's degree. I'm an employed professional in the healthcare field. I'm attractive, down to earth, and out going.
You: Be between 33-45. Must be employed,have own vehicle, and live alone. You have to be able to carry on an intellectual conversation as well. Please have pictures ready to share I have mine ready. I hope to hear from you soon.

text:

title: Are you the one for me?
text:
Fun, uplifting, vivacious, Sassy, sweet, thoughtful, with a great personality. I'm also very sarcastic and funny.

I like to have fun and laugh. I'm at that point in my life where I want to have new adventures.

I'm not looking for a "hook up". I'm looking for a friendship/dating and to take it from there.

My perfect guy: cute, good sense of humor, good career, intelligent, non-smoker, social drinker, good shape, likes to have fun, between the ages of 36-54

Please send your age, location, and please include a recent non-blurry pic with your response. 

Yes mutual attraction is important.

No married men.

Looking forward to hearing from you put READ ME in the subject title.

title: Here we go......again!
text:
I'll make it simple: single wf looking for single (not married, separated, or otherwise partnered) wm. Please be over 5'9", between the ages of 50 and 60,a non smoker, have grown or no kids, and have some interests in common. Some of the things I enjoy are sports, antiquing, being 'out', good food and wine, great conversations, road trips to nowhere, the beach, reading, etc. 
Let's start talking and see where it takes us! Tell me a bit about yourself - more than 'hi' or 'here's my number'! And avoid photos of your 'assets'......they are not a good introduction! 
To avoid the inevitable spam please include one of the teams playing in the 'big game' on 2/7!

title: Seeking Valentine's Date
text:
I am a twenty-two year old nearly-college grad looking for a special someone to share a romantic valentine's day dinner with me. 

I am 5'5", brunette, blue-eyed, love bad (good) puns, must love dogs & Fleetwood Mac. Honestly, I'm just a cool girl looking for some good food, great wine and even better conversation.

Write to me with a pic of yourself and your idea of a perfect Valentine's Day date. 

Hope to hear from you,
K

title: Tired of the Search
text: Great woman looking for a great guy. I'm down to earth, open minded, understanding, love to have fun and laugh. I have a great personality. I'm intelligent and can hold a conversation. I'm not looking for a one night stand just hoping to find someone I connect with and then can grow with. I am divorced with 2 kids so I am not looking for anymore. honest fun men over 38 and under 50 need apply and let's see if we connect. Thanks for reading and take care.
